dungeonadventure

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExplodeObserver, WaterPipeBreakObserver, Inspectable, Nameable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Nameable, Inspectable, java.io.Serializable, ExplodeObserver, WaterPipeBreakObserver
    Player has an inventory of Items and a location (Space). He reacts to game ending situations like explosion and water pipe breaking.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
